sen.j: 松花堂（しょうかどう）は、京都府八幡市にある日本庭園と美術館。
sen.e: Located in Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture, Shokado houses a Japanese garden and an art museum.
Located in Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture, Shokado houses a Japanese garden and an art museum.
Located in Yawata City, Kyoto Prefecture, Shokado houses a Japanese garden and an art museum.
It is designated as a National Historic Site.
It is designated as a National Historic Site.
It is designated as a National Historic Site.

sen.j: 松花堂昭乗が江戸時代初期（1637年）にかまえた方丈と庭園で、現在八幡市立松花堂庭園・松花堂美術館として整備されている。
sen.e: It was a hut and garden built by Shojyo SHOKADO in the beginning of Edo Period (1637), and is now turned into Municipal Yawata Shokado Garden and Shokado Art Museum.
sen.cmt: 八幡市立松花堂庭園・松花堂美術館→Municipal Yawata Shokado Garden and Shokado Art Museum[定訳不明]
sen.e: It was a hut and garden built by Shojyo SHOKADO at the beginning of the Edo Period (1637), and has now been turned into the Municipal Yawata Shokado Garden and Shokado Art Museum.
sen.cmt: 「in」→「at」, 「the」挿入x2,, 「is now turned」→「has now been turned」
sen.e: It was a hut and garden built by Shojo SHOKADO at the beginning of the Edo period (1637), and has now been turned into the Municipal Yawata Shokado Garden and Shokado Art Museum.
sen.cmt: Shojo としました。period 小文字にしました。

sen.e: Facilities
Features
sen.cmt: I don't think we can call some of the following, such as the pagoda 'facilities'.
sen.e: Features
Shokado Garden
Shokado Garden
Shokado Garden

sen.j: 外園 - 約400種類の竹がある池泉回遊式日本庭園
sen.e: Gaien (Outer garden): Chisen (ponds and springs) Tour Japanese Garden with bamboos of about 400 kinds.
sen.cmt: 池泉回遊式日本庭園→Chisen Tour Japanese Garden[定訳不明]
sen.e: Gaien (Outer garden): Chisen (ponds and springs) walk-through Japanese Garden with about 400 kinds of bamboo.
sen.cmt: 再構成しました。I think bamboo sounds more natural as an uncountable noun. 'Tour Japanese Garden' is difficult to grasp - perhaps 'walk-through' might be easier for the reader to understand.
sen.e: Gaien (Outer garden): Chisen (ponds and springs) walk-through Japanese Garden with about 400 kinds of bamboo.

sen.j: 松花堂（京都府指定文化財） - 草庵茶室兼持仏堂
sen.e: Shokado (cultural property designated by Kyoto Prefecture) - tea hut/tea room and jibutsudo (a small hut with an Buhddist alcove)

sen.j: 京阪電気鉄道京阪本線 樟葉駅または八幡市駅より京阪バスで10分、「大芝・松花堂前」下車すぐ
sen.e: From Kuzuha Station or Yawata-shi Station of Keihan Honsen of Keihan Electric Railway, take Keihan Bus and in ten minutes get off at "Oshiba-shokado-mae" bus stop. It is very close to the bus stop.

From Kuzuha Station or Yawata-shi Station on the Keihan Honsen train line run by Keihan Electric Railway, take the Keihan Bus and after ten minutes get off at "Oshiba-shokado-mae" bus stop, which is just outside Shokado.
sen.cmt: 「of」→「on the」, 「of」→「train line run by」, 「the」挿入, 「in」→「after」,「It is very close to the bus stop.」→「, which is just outside Shokado.」一文に戻しました。
sen.e: From Kuzuha Station or Yawata-shi Station on the Keihan Main Line run by Keihan Electric Railway, take the Keihan Bus and after ten minutes get off at 'Oshiba-shokado-mae' bus stop, which is just outside Shokado.
sen.cmt: Keihan Main Line としました。

sen.j: JR片町線 松井山手駅から京阪バスで15分、「大芝・松花堂前」下車すぐ
sen.e: From Matsui-yamate Station of JR Katamachi Line, take Keihan Bus and in 15 minutes get off at "Oshiba-shokado-mae" bus stop. It is very close to the bus stop.
From Matsui-yamate Station on the JR Katamachi Line, take the Keihan Bus and after 15 minutes get off at "Oshiba-shokado-mae" bus stop.
sen.cmt: 「of」→「on the」,「the」挿入, 「in」→「after」,「It is very close to the bus stop.」削除, 一文に戻しました。
sen.e: From Matsui-yamate Station on the JR Katamachi Line, take the Keihan Bus and after fifteen minutes get off at 'Oshiba-shokado-mae' bus stop.
sen.cmt: " → ' としました。数字をスペルアウトしました。
